summary: Completed frontend testing of Amendment Studio system integration across all 5 governance editor pages. Code analysis confirms proper implementation, but authentication barrier prevents full UI testing.

authentication_barrier.issue: Application requires Google authentication which cannot be bypassed in testing environment
authentication_barrier.workaround: Manual testing required with valid Google credentials

code_analysis_findings.issue: All 5 governance editor pages properly import and integrate AmendmentStudio component
code_analysis_findings.details: MeetingEditorPage.jsx, DistributionEditorPage.jsx, DisputeEditorPage.jsx, InsuranceEditorPage.jsx, and CompensationEditorPage.jsx all correctly import AmendmentStudio from '../components/governance' and implement the modal trigger

passed_tests: Frontend application loads without console errors
Homepage renders correctly with OMNIGOVAULT branding
Navigation structure is present and functional
Code analysis confirms Amendment Studio component is properly implemented
All 5 governance editor pages import AmendmentStudio correctly
AmendmentStudio component has proper change type selection (amendment/correction)
AmendmentStudio component includes required reason field and optional effective date
All editor pages have 'Amend' buttons that trigger AmendmentStudio modal instead of direct amendment creation
RevisionHistory component is properly implemented for version tracking
action_item_for_main_agent: Authentication barrier prevents complete UI testing. The Amendment Studio system appears to be properly implemented based on code analysis. All 5 governance editor pages correctly integrate the AmendmentStudio component. Manual testing with valid Google credentials is needed to verify the complete user flow including: 1) Navigation to governance tabs, 2) Opening individual editor pages, 3) Clicking 'Amend' buttons, 4) Testing AmendmentStudio modal functionality, 5) Verifying amendment creation workflow.

success_percentage.backend: N/A - Backend testing not required for this task
success_percentage.frontend: 80% - Code analysis confirms proper implementation, but authentication prevents full UI testing

should_main_agent_test_itself: true - Main agent should perform manual testing with authentication or provide test credentials
